data.name: Christmas Club
data.description: This account is a special purpose account for members to save towards Christmas expenses. Withdrawal restrictions apply to this account from February to October each year. There are no minimum balance requirements or monthly account keeping fees.

features.additionalInfo:
Releationship Balance $ 0 - $ 3,000 - 10 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance $ 3,001 - $ 5,000 - 12 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance $ 5,001 - $ 8,000 - 16 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance $ 8,001 - $20,000 - 20 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance $ 20,001 - $50,000 - 30 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance $ 50,001 - $100,000 - 40 Free Transactions
Releationship Balance Greater - $100,000 - Unlimited Free Transactions

Relationship balance is the total balance of all savings accounts and loan accounts with First Choice Credit Union.

fees.name: Christmas Club Early Wdl Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Only charged on withdrawals between February and October each year.
